title: Client is causing 6000 ping spikes even if your internet is fine?
body:
Seems like league's client is literally causing 6000 ping spikes to any person, I've played about 2 games to this point and I've been affected once, the next game it seemed like my teammates were affected. This ping spike would go on for as long as you were in the game until you restarted your client? I lost both games cause of this issue, why is this even happening and why am I losing LP in ranked because of the fact that riot is causing people to have 6000 ping spikes and AFKing?

Does anyone have any idea as to why this is happening... I am 100% sure this is not luck based as it happened 2 times in a row. My friend is also constantly getting it in her games aswell.

replies.body: I'm seeing quite a few of these reports tonight and I'm starting to wonder if this might be some damaged node that is affecting a large amount of people. If you could, I want to have you guys all run a quick traceroute to see what your connection looks like after it leaves your network. Use a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to the EUNE servers at 31.186.224.42 and paste the results here for me.
2 games in row me and my friends got a 7000 ping in ranked so i lose LP.... :(
Lol me and my friend getting 7k lag spikes also. Even though our internet is fine. Enemy team had the same thing
Yeah I don't get it I can't even play normals properly...
Reconnect. It helps. But hopefully they fix it soon

For me the reconnect still not help. Even the client didn't let me reconnect to the game only after the second or third client restart and after 1-2 min my ping went over 7k and the game decided to go into reconnecting state...
I saw couple of ppl with this 6k ping and they fix it by restarting(not sure if this is the client or computer but try both).
If you can't reconnect trying shutting down the process through the task manager. If you find all the processes including the league game there is a possibility the lag will dissapear completely.
